d3fc-scripts

Inspired by react-scripts, common set of scripts for building the d3fc projects

This module is only intended to be used by d3fc organisation projects.

  • Annotation
  • Axis
  • Data Join
  • Discontinuous Scale
  • Element
  • Extent
  • Financial Feed
  • Label Layout
  • Pointer
  • Random Data
  • Rebind
  • Sample
  • Scripts
  • Series
  • Shape
  • Technical Indicator
